bug.title: "pd" is not the abbreviation for "pounds". it is "lb"
bug.description:
``` select Menu > Preferences > Units > Imperial
The abbreviation for the unit "pounds" next to the displayed weight should read "lb". Instead it reads "pd". https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pound_(mass)
droidweight version 1.3.3
The attached file is an export of the fix for this bug ```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `twellman@gmail.com` on 11 Jun 2012 at 3:47
Attachments: - [droidweight-lb.patch](https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-attachments/droidweight/issue-12/comment-0/droidweight-lb.patch)
